jobs.title: Frontend Engineer, Payments
jobs.description: Airbnb was born in 2007 when two hosts welcomed three guests to their San Francisco home, and has since grown to over 5 million hosts who have welcomed over 2 billion guest arrivals in almost every country across the globe. Every day, hosts offer unique stays and experiences that make it possible for guests to connect with communities in a more authentic way.
requirements:
Job Search

	Connect Engineering Apprenticeship
	Internship Programs
	Contractor Roles

Job Search

	Connect Engineering Apprenticeship
	Internship Programs
	Contractor Roles
Work closely with product managers and Backend engineers on the team to review, design and develop Payments products.
Participate in all phases of software development from architecture/design through implementation, testing, and on-call.
Manage a frontend development team of 5 contractors, overseeing code reviews and ensuring consistent productivity.
Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends, technologies, and best practices in Web development.

Building a culture of Craftsmanship, where we are not only delivering on Business initiatives, but also take pride in the work and ship with confidence.

jobs.title: Backend Software Engineer, Storefronts
jobs.description: Airbnb was born in 2007 when two hosts welcomed three guests to their San Francisco home, and has since grown to over 5 million hosts who have welcomed over 2 billion guest arrivals in almost every country across the globe. Every day, hosts offer unique stays and experiences that make it possible for guests to connect with communities in a more authentic way.
requirements:
Job Search

	Connect Engineering Apprenticeship
	Internship Programs
	Contractor Roles

Job Search

	Connect Engineering Apprenticeship
	Internship Programs
	Contractor Roles
Deliver useful, personalized new features for Airbnb’s homepage; enabling guests around the world to find places to stay and more on Airbnb.
Support new, growing products on Airbnb’s global platform like Airbnb Experiences and Services.
Contribute to technical improvements that make the team’s products higher quality and increase the team’s velocity.
Develop new APIs to power interfaces that enable users to navigate and discover new Airbnb products.
Contribute to improving performance and robustness of backend services and architecture powering Airbnb’s homepage & search alongside other search product engineering teams.

Explore, shape, and develop new product experiences alongside cross-functional partners (design and product); from ideation to implementation at scale
Lead investments into new technical capabilities that push the envelope and unlock product innovation

jobs.title: Engineering Manager, Ambassador Routing
jobs.description: Airbnb was born in 2007 when two hosts welcomed three guests to their San Francisco home, and has since grown to over 5 million hosts who have welcomed over 2 billion guest arrivals in almost every country across the globe. Every day, hosts offer unique stays and experiences that make it possible for guests to connect with communities in a more authentic way.
requirements:
Job Search

	Connect Engineering Apprenticeship
	Internship Programs
	Contractor Roles

Job Search

	Connect Engineering Apprenticeship
	Internship Programs
	Contractor Roles
Lead a team of engineers building routing and decisioning capabilities that improve customer outcomes and operational efficiency.

Build and scale Skills Based Routing that better matches contacts to ambassador skills;  enable Differentiated Service experiences that appropriately tailor support pathways to customer context - improving quality, speed, and customer satisfaction.
Contribute to Airbnb wide initiatives (e.g. Services, Experiences, multi-region resiliency) by aligning team capabilities with shared goals and ensuring smooth integration across dependencies.
Raise the bar on technical quality and execution through roadmap planning, clear ownership, and pragmatic architecture and design reviews.
Partner closely with Product, Data, Science, Operations, and adjacent engineering teams to drive success metrics (e.g., NPS, CSAT, time-to-resolution)

jobs.title: Engineering Manager - Tax Platform
jobs.description: Airbnb was born in 2007 when two hosts welcomed three guests to their San Francisco home, and has since grown to over 5 million hosts who have welcomed over 2 billion guest arrivals in almost every country across the globe. Every day, hosts offer unique stays and experiences that make it possible for guests to connect with communities in a more authentic way.
requirements:
Job Search

	Connect Engineering Apprenticeship
	Internship Programs
	Contractor Roles

Job Search

	Connect Engineering Apprenticeship
	Internship Programs
	Contractor Roles
We are looking for a self-motivated leader who is interested in working in a highly dynamic environment by collaborating with cross-functional and cross-geographical teams.

As an Engineering Manager, you would be expected to bring in expertise of managing large scale, and platforms, and support Airbnb’s Tax Engineering and scale it to efficiently adapt to ever evolving regulatory needs.
You will be responsible for recruiting and building a team of top-notch engineers and building a culture of craftsmanship and excellence.

As an engineering manager, you’ll be responsible for establishing a technical vision and building alignment within engineering and cross-functional teams - all while delivering a solution that is flexible, always available, efficient, and scales with the needs of the business. Your own unique skill set, rich experiences and thought leadership will be key to success in this role.
Building relationships and working rhythms across peers and stakeholders.

jobs.title: Business Solutions Engineer, (Agentic AI)
jobs.description: Airbnb was born in 2007 when two hosts welcomed three guests to their San Francisco home, and has since grown to over 5 million hosts who have welcomed over 2 billion guest arrivals in almost every country across the globe. Every day, hosts offer unique stays and experiences that make it possible for guests to connect with communities in a more authentic way.
requirements:
Job Search

	Connect Engineering Apprenticeship
	Internship Programs
	Contractor Roles

Job Search

	Connect Engineering Apprenticeship
	Internship Programs
	Contractor Roles
Feature Support: Managing product feature lifecycles, which includes responding to production support issues and handling change requests.
Stakeholder Alignment: Engaging directly with business partners to define and agree upon necessary changes, covering requirements gathering, design, delivery timelines, and testing plans.
Platform Enhancement: Focusing on optimizing and enhancing their team's platforms, seeking out opportunities for process improvement and automation using technical and analytical skills.
Technical Delivery: Taking ownership of the partial delivery of system or tool changes, including the execution of configuration updates and building low to medium complexity solutions and bug fixes.

Information Gathering and Strategy: Working with cross-functional teams to translate their needs into effective platform solutions, and using data and reporting to suggest actionable insights for data-driven decisions.
